transcript: Have you seen these viral videos before? Yes, they were all made with AI, and here's how. Name is the easiest tool that allows you to create them. With NIM, you can explore trending niches and create viral videos by typing a simple prompt like a person flying on a horse over mountains during Roman times. Remix existing creations to make your own. Learn exactly how others made their viral hits. I created this with an easy prompt like Mouse Cuts Tomatoes with Knife. First, go to create and select text to image. Click on enhance prompt and select flux pro. Next, click on image to video and select cling pro. Then hit generate. Comment AI, and I will send you the tool. Or you can go under my username to get an exclusive discount.
